hangle: 이 정도에 꼬리를 말 거면 왜 시비를 거는지 몰라.
first_translate: why did she pick a fight if she was going to run away so easily?
second_translate: Why did she pick a fight if she was going to run away so easily?
label: I don't know why she started this if she was going to back down this easily.

hangle: 정신 차려. 어제는 이보다 더 했잖아.
first_translate: get a hold of yourself. yesterday was even worse.
second_translate: Get a hold of yourself. Yesterday was even worse than this.
label: get a hold of yourself. we did a lot more than this yesterday.

hangle: 네가 하는 거랑 내가 하는 건 느낌이 다르다고….
first_translate: it’s different when you do it...
second_translate: it’s different when you do it...
label: it feels different when you do it...

hangle: 그래도 그냥 입술에 가볍게 했을 뿐이잖아?
first_translate: but it was just a light kiss on the lips.
second_translate: But didn't I just give a light kiss on the lips?
label: still, I only gave you a light peck on the lips,
I should give you two some privacy...!

first_translate: you need to prepare for tomorrow’s expedition!
second_translate: You need to prepare for tomorrow’s expedition!
label: we should get ready to leave tomorrow.

second_translate: We’ll take a short break here!
label: let's stop here and get some rest!

hangle: 도착할 때까지 유니스 영애와 같은 마차는 절대 못 탈 거야
first_translate: I won’t be able to ride in the same carriage as lady eunice until we arrive.
second_translate: ...I won’t be able to ride in the same carriage as lady eunice until we arrive.
label: how am I gonna ride in eunice's carriage now?

first_translate: is that such a big deal?
second_translate: is that such a big deal?
label: is it really that big of a deal?

second_translate: It's a big deal to me.
label: it is to me.

hangle: 좀 친해져서 유니스의 힘을 확인하려 했단 말이다.
first_translate: I wanted to get close to her and check her powers.
second_translate: I wanted to get close to her and check her powers...
label: I wanted to become friends with eunice so that I could confirm her powers.

hangle: 그런데 코앞에서 사람 협박하고, 사랑과 전쟁을 실시간으로 찍어버렸네…
first_translate: but I threatened someone right in front of her and turned it into a love triangle...
second_translate: ...but I threatened someone right in front of her and turned it into a love triangle...
label: not only have I threatened someone, but I’ve even acted out a love and war scene right in front of her...

first_translate: I wonder what she thinks of me now...
second_translate: ...I wonder what she thinks of me now...
label: what will she think of me now...?

first_translate: do you like her that much?
second_translate: do you like her that much?
label: do you like her that much...?

hangle: 티 파티 이후로 우리를 볼 때마다 발그레 해지는 것도 그렇고.
first_translate: she blushes every time she sees us after the tea party.
second_translate: she blushes every time she sees us after the tea party.
label: she's been blushing every time we run into her after the tea party.

first_translate: I don’t see it at all.
second_translate: I don’t see it at all.
label: I don't get it at all.

first_translate: I made him so he could date her...
second_translate: I made him so he could date her...
label: what are these two thinking? they're supposed to be together in my story...

hangle: 너희 둘이 사랑을 해야 유니스가 각성을 하고 세계를 구한다고….
first_translate: they need to fall in love so eunice can awaken and save the world...
second_translate: ...they need to fall in love so eunice can awaken and save the world...
label: they need to fall in love with each other for eunice to awaken and save the world...

hangle: 그 방법이 안 될 것 같으니,
first_translate: but it doesn’t seem like that’s going to work,
second_translate: but it doesn’t seem like that’s going to work...
label: since that's clearly not going to work,

hangle: 이번에 가는 죽은 땅에서 뭔가 힌트라도 얻길 바라는 수밖에….
first_translate: so I’ll have to find some clues in the deadlands...
second_translate: ...so I’ll have to find some clues in the deadlands...
label: I'll have to find some kind of hint about her powers in the dead lands...

hangle: 시그렌, 나 잠깐 어디 좀 다녀올게!
first_translate: siegren, I’m going to go somewhere for a bit!
second_translate: siegren, I’m going to go somewhere for a bit!
label: siegren, I'll be right back!

first_translate: I’m going to save the innocent lady!
second_translate: I'm going to rescue the innocent young lady!
label: I'm off to save an innocent young lady!

hangle: 혼자 있으니까 조금 마음이 편해지는 기분이야.
first_translate: I feel a bit more at ease being alone.
second_translate: I feel a bit more at ease being alone.
label: it's so peaceful having some time alone like this.

hangle: 행렬에는 사람이 너무 많아서 괜히 지쳐….
first_translate: there are too many people in the procession, and it’s exhausting...
second_translate: there are too many people in the procession, and it’s exhausting...
label: with such a large caravan of people, it can get quite tiring...

first_translate: what are you doing here, miss?
second_translate: what are you doing here, miss?
label: what are you doing here, miss?

first_translate: do you want to play with us for a bit?
second_translate: Do you want to play with me for a bit?
label: you wanna have some fun?

first_translate: now, now. don’t be like that.
second_translate: Come on now, don’t throw a tantrum.
label: now, now. don't make a fuss.

first_translate: and get back to your post.
label: ...and return to your positions.

second_translate: Come on, you come over here too!
label: all right, you can join us!

first_translate: he doesn’t seem to recognize me or eunice.
second_translate: It seems they don't recognize me or Eunice.
label: it looks like they don't know who eunice and I are.

first_translate: then I’ll have to show him who I am.
second_translate: Then I’ll just have to show them who I really am.
label: I guess I'll have to show them, then.

first_translate: there’s no need for you to dirty your hands.
second_translate: There’s no need for you to dirty your hands.
label: we don't need you to dirty your hands.

hangle: 권터 씨네 사람인 줄은 미처 몰랐습니다.
first_translate: I didn’t know she was with you, sir.
second_translate: I didn’t realize you were with Gunter.
label: we didn't know they were with you, gunter... sir.

hangle: 아가씨는 놔드릴 테니 한 번 봐주시죠.
first_translate: I’ll let her go, so please forgive me.
second_translate: I’ll let the young lady go, so please let this slide just once.
label: we'll let the ladies go, so please leave us alone.

second_translate: Come on, hurry up and go!
label: well, go on!

first_translate: we’ll be going now that we’ve returned the lady...
second_translate: we’ll be going now that we’ve returned the lady...
label: we’ve let them go now, so please--

hangle: 너희를 이대로 보내면 내가 공작한테 더러운 꼴을 당해서.
first_translate: if I let you go, I’ll be in trouble with duke walford.
second_translate: ...if I let you go, I’ll be in trouble with duke walford.
label: well, the duke will give me hell if I just let you go.
...cut the things dangling between their legs?
